rows:
In case of warm start or a hard reset (when VBATT powers RTC in case of power loss), user 
might not want to reinitialize the clock source after reset. In this case, disable the Set 
Source Clock in Open property for RTC and call R_RTC_ClockSourceSet() only when RTC 
clock source needs to be set. Application should check for the reset type and should 
accordingly call the R_RTC_ClockSourceSet().
